qas.question: Along with slot machines, what is a modern game that is increasingly present in pubs?
What is a pub that plays pop and hip-hop music called?
At what sort of pub can you watch rugby union on television?
Along with Bat and trap, what game is popular in south London pubs?

context: Increasingly, more modern games such as <a0_0>video games<a0_0/> and slot machines are provided. Pubs hold special events, from tournaments of the aforementioned games to karaoke nights to pub quizzes. Some play pop music and hip-hop (<a1_0>dance bar<a1_0/>), or show football and rugby union on big screen televisions (<a2_0>sports bar<a2_0/>). <a3_0>Shove ha'penny<a3_0/> and Bat and trap were also popular in pubs south of London.
